sect2.title: Installation of Grep
sect2.para: The meaning of the configure switches:

listitem.para: --disable-perl-regexp: This makes sure that grep does not get linked against a PCRE library that may be present on the host, but would not be available once we enter the chroot environment.
--with-included-regex: This ensures that Grep uses its internal regular expression code. Without it, it will use the code from Glibc, which is known to be slightly buggy.
